DataElement.preferredName: Second Clinical Trial Protocol Therapy Begin Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the start date of the second clinical trial protocol therapy of the specified modality for the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the second clinical trial protocol therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.:An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered.

Concepts.definition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.

A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.

Property.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event began.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/23/17 jk transferred context, cap first letter in def, and added CSI, registration status per Round 5 finalization task.

DataElement.origin: CALGB CRF:Cancer and Leukemia Group B Case Report Form
